title: Delicious Apple Crumble with Oat Topping
ingredients: ['750ml (1 1/4 pints) water', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '200g (7 oz) caster sugar', '1 dessertspoon cornflour', '9 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and finely diced', '75g (3 oz) porridge oats', '100g (4 oz) butter, melted', '50g (2 oz) dark brown soft sugar']
